title: C Level 2 â€” Variables, Operators & Expressions
intro: This level focuses on variables, operators, and forming valid expressions in C.
points: Declare and initialize variables of different types (int, float, char).
Understand arithmetic operators: +, -, *, /, % and operator precedence.
Use assignment and compound assignment operators like +=, -=.
Understand increment and decrement operators: ++ and --.
Write expressions combining multiple operators and predict the result.
